90703	Zn	II	Na-montmorillonite	n.r.	186	Zenith montmorillonite. Chemical composition=Na0.63K0.07 Ca0.11[Si7.75Al0.25]-{Al3.21Mg0.69Fe+30.05Ti0.05}O20(OH)4. Sodium exchange samples were prepared by immersing the clay into 1M solution of sodium chloride.
